name: BBC News
author: Thomas Duncan
title: Ronaldo rages on to eclipse McTominay's latest Scotland heroics
description: Cristiano Ronaldo came off the bench to score his 901st career goal
content: Having been left on the bench and unleashed at half-time by Roberto Martinez with Scotland 1-0 up, the game almost instantly became the Ronaldo show. Before his winner he hit both posts, moaned and furiously gesticulated at the referee and team-mates, while also being pursued by a pitch invader at one stage.

name: BBC News
author: Jane Doe
title: Inter Miami 5-0 Orlando City: Luis Suarez & Lionel Messi score twice in MLS rout
description: Luis Suarez had a hand in four of Inter Miami's five goals
content: Luis Suarez scored his first goals for Inter Miami and Lionel Messi also netted twice as they thrashed Orlando City in the MLS.

name: BBC News
author: R C Jay
title: Gundogan 'wanted to leave' Barcelona
description: Barcelona president Joan Laporta says Ilkay Gundogan 'decided that he wanted to leave' and his move was not due to financial pressures at the club.
content: The 33-year-old returned to Manchester City just a year after leaving, and it was reported to be due to ongoing high costs that were preventing the Catalan giants registering a number of new signings.

name: BBC News
author: Jacob Doe
title: Barcelona or Premier League? Changed man Hansi Flick ready to return to management
description: From one of Europe's most-wanted managers to the first coach sacked by Germany - Hansi Flick's career has been a rollercoaster over the past few years.
content: Following a spectacularly successful spell with Bayern Munich, on 10 September he made history when he was dismissed by his country after a 4-1 friendly defeat by Japan made it three losses in a row.

name: BBC News
author: Susan Philip
title: Hansi Flick sacked by Germany as Euro 2024 hosts lose patience
description: Hansi Flick won 70 of his 86 games in charge of Bayern Munich from November 2019 to June 2021
content: Hansi Flick has been sacked as Germany manager following Saturday's 4-1 friendly defeat by Japan in Wolfsburg.

name: BBC News
author: Jerin Joseph
title: Palmer and Chilwell not in Chelsea European squad
description: Cole Palmer and Ben Chilwell have been left out of Chelsea's European squad for different reasons
content: Cole Palmer and Ben Chilwell are among four senior players left out of Chelsea's Conference League squad.England forward Palmer, midfielder Romeo Lavia and defender Wesley Fofana have been purposely left out to manage their workload.
